content: Group {{groupName}} will be deleted. Users in the group will not be removed from {{productName}}. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message when deleting a group, informing users that the group will be deleted but not their data. The text appears in a delete dialog when confirming deletion of a group.

usage.context:
<Text>
 {hasMoreGroups
 ? t("DeleteDialog:DeleteAllGroupDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 })
 : t("DeleteDialog:DeleteGroupDescription", {
 productName: t("Common:ProductName"),
 groupName,
 })}
 </Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Finnish translation lacks a space after the hyphen in '{{productName}}-sta'. It should be '{{productName}}-sta '. This is standard Finnish punctuation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ryhmä {{groupName}} poistetaan. Ryhmän käyttäjiä ei poisteta {{productName}}-sta . Haluatko varmasti jatkaa?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Armenian translation uses a colon (:) after 'ջնջվի' which doesn't match the English punctuation. The English uses a period (.)
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: {{groupName}} խումբը կջնջվի։ Խմբի օգտատերերը չեն հեռացվի {{productName}}-ից։ Վստա՞հ եք, որ ցանկանում եք շարունակել: should be {{groupName}} խումբը կջնջվի. Խմբի օգտատերերը չեն հեռացվի {{productName}}-ից։ Վստա՞հ եք, որ ցանկանում եք շարունակել:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Japanese translation uses full-width characters, which is standard for Japanese. However, within a software UI, mixing full-width and half-width characters (especially for variable names like {{groupName}} and {{productName}}) can cause layout issues and visual inconsistencies. It's recommended to ensure all variable placeholders are also full-width.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure all variable placeholders ({{groupName}} and {{productName}}) are also full-width characters (全角).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the translation is generally accurate, the phrase "続けてよろしいですか？" (tsuzukete yoroshii desu ka?) literally translates to 'Is it alright to continue?'. A more natural and common phrasing for a confirmation dialog would be something along the lines of "よろしいですか？" (yoroshii desu ka?) or "実行しますか？" (jikkou shimasu ka?).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "続けてよろしいですか？" with "よろしいですか？" or "実行しますか？".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Korean translation uses a direct transliteration of "Are you sure you want to continue?" which is somewhat unnatural in Korean. A more natural phrasing would be preferred.

The phrase "ຄຸ້ມກຸ່ມ" (khum gum) doesn't directly translate to "Group". It could be interpreted as 'covering group' or something similar, which is not accurate in this context. A more appropriate translation for 'Group' would be something like 'ກຸ່ມ' (gum) alone.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ຄຸ້ມກຸ່ມ' with 'ກຸ່ມ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ຖືກຖອນອອກຈາກ" (thuk thon ok jak) translates to 'will be withdrawn from' which isn't the ideal phrasing for removing users from a product. A better translation would convey that the users remain associated with the product.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ຖືກຖອນອອກຈາກ' with 'ຍັງຢູ່ໃນ' or 'ບໍ່ຖືກລົບອອກຈາກ'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses "Weet u zeker" instead of a more natural equivalent to "Are you sure". A more common and fluent option would be "Bent u zeker" or "Zeker?".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bent u zeker dat u door wilt gaan?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The question mark at the end of the sentence is missing a space in the Romanian translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Grupul {{groupName}} va fi șters. Utilizatorii care fac parte din acest grup nu vor fi eliminați din {{productName}}. Sigur doriţi să continuați?

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The question mark at the end of the Russian translation is missing a space. It should be 'Продолжить? '

The phrase "කණ්ඩායමේ සිටින පරිශීලකයින් ඉවත් කරනු නොලැබේ" is a literal translation of 'Users in the group will not be removed'. A more natural and fluent Sinhala phrasing would be something like 'කණ්ඩායමේ සිටින පරිශීලකයින් වෙනස් නොවනු ඇත' (Users in the group will not be changed/altered).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කණ්ඩායමේ සිටින පරිශීලකයින් වෙනස් නොවනු ඇත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While the use of "{{groupName}}" and "{{productName}}" is consistent with the English source, ensure this formatting is correctly handled within the Sinhala user interface to properly render the dynamic values.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Verify the proper rendering of "{{groupName}}" and "{{productName}}" in the Sinhala UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-а' is attached to {{productName}} in the Serbian translation. While grammatically possible, it might sound unnatural depending on the context and product name. Consider if it's intended and if a simpler phrasing would be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the '-а' or rephrasing the sentence to avoid it (e.g., 'Корисници у групи неће бити уклоњени са {{productName}}').

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "простору {{productName}}" (space {{productName}}) is not the most accurate translation of "{{productName}}". It implies a container or area, which might be misleading.  A more appropriate translation might be something like "{{productName}}" itself or "{{productName}} сервісу" (service {{productName}}).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Групу {{groupName}} буде видалено. Користувачів у групі не буде видалено з {{productName}}. Ви впевнені, що бажаєте продовжити?
